thread.section_title: HiFX Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HiFX Australia | hifx.com.au
thread.title: Maria Stafford
thread.title_full: HiFX Australia reviewed by Maria Stafford

author: Maria Stafford
title: Maria Stafford
text: I have been using HIFX to transfer money from the UK to Australia for over 9 years. They have always been efficient and courteous in dealing with me, and if anything, the time taken to transfer funds has reduced and is even more efficient. Their rates always reflect market rates and are better than. Rates posted by the banks. I would have no hesitation in recommending them to others.
